Package edu.missouristate.taschedulegenerator.util

Class SceneManager

java.lang.Object
edu.missouristate.taschedulegenerator.util.SceneManager
public class SceneManager
extends Object
Utility class that manages loading and swapping scenes.
Author:
Noah Geren

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static interface  SceneManager.Controller<T>
    Interface used to pass data to controllers before showing them.

  • Field Summary

    Map of scene names to their controller objects.

    The stage the scenes are being shown on.
    private static Map<String,​javafx.scene.Parent> scenes
    Map of scene names to their root components.

  • Constructor Details

    • SceneManager

      private SceneManager()
      This class should only be accessed statically.

  • Method Details

    • init

      public static void init​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, String... scenes)
      Loads the given scene FMXL files and shows the first listed scene.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - The stage to show scenes on.
      scenes - The list of scene FXML files that should be loaded.

    • showScene

      public static void showScene​(String scene)
      Shows a scene that was previously loaded.
      Parameters:
      scene - The name of the scene to show.

    • showScene

      public static <T> void showScene​(String scene, T data)
      Shows a scene that was previously loaded and passes provided data to the scene controller's initData method.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the data being passed and the controller it is being passed to.
      Parameters:
      scene - The name of the scene to show.
      data - The data that will be passed to the scene controller's initData method.
